thread.section_title: PostNord i Danmark Anmeldelser | Kundernes anmeldelser af PostNord i Danmark | www.postnord.dk
thread.title: Vy Binau
thread.title_full: PostNord i Danmark anmeldt af Vy Binau

author: Vy Binau
title: Vy Binau
text:
The experience was fine. However, the lady seemed a bit mad and blamed me for my broken door bell. Saying that if the door bell does not work next time, she will just walk away without knocking the door. I guess it's fair, except there are several times I know for certain that they just leave the note without walking up the stairs and deliver the package as I work from home most of the time and sit right by the entrance window.
Nevertheless, most of the employees I have met are very very friendly and cheerful (despite the weather). Not sure if my feedback means anything, but if I am asked, I would recommend them for their friendliness & promptness.
